name: Superweapons Project
description:
(Download will be removed on the 9th of July after the UAL Games Design show is finished. Please contact us through our website if you are interested in accessing our game.)

The Superweapons Project is a sci-fi fast paced flight combat game where you can play as heavily enhanced humans who defend a city from an AI uprising. The main objective of the game is to provide an experience that can recreate the aesthetics of over the top aerial combat in the “Mecha'' genre of Japanese animations. 

Plow your way through never ending waves of robot enemies designed like various creatures, with a fast paced melee combat system and high precision 3rd person shooter mechanics. Customize your mecha wings, and switch ammo types to optimize your playstyle. How long can you hold the AI uprising back before your city crumbles?
